text:
IP Fabric | Backend Developer | Prague, CZ | ONSITE

We build software for visualization and control of global IP network infrastructure, fully mapping connectivity from end to end and all the way down to the electrical signals. Our work helps prevent deadly network outages or find the exact cause of that spinning wheel slowness. What you create will benefit all IP network infrastructure engineering, and will enable the Internet to grow at its foundation.

We're looking for database/backend guru that will make snapshots/timestamps work.

We're storing network state in a multimodel database (graph + docs + kv). The network state information seldom changes, and it's useless to store 1GB of new data every 30 minutes.

  Our stack
  * Node.JS, ArangoDB, RabbitMQ
  * Openstack/KVM, Debian (own infrastructure)

  What we offer
  * Challenges that create real value
  * Initial Equity, and additional equity as bounties.
  * Flexible working hours and home office
  * Equipment of your choice, various budgets to make your workplace feel like home
  * Cool offices in the center of Prague with a lot of light
Email me at pavel@ipfabric.io
